career_opportunities: Careers in financial analysis, quantitative finance, risk management, corporate finance, financial consultancy, data analysis, and financial product development in banking and finance sectors
requirements: GCE A/L (Local) – Three passes in one sitting in Mathematics/Biology/Commerce streams OR Equivalent foreign qualifications (e.g. Edexcel, London A/L, Cambridge A/L) including Mathematics OR any other equivalent qualification accepted by the faculty and senate
